graph.original_query: What all data do we have about DLF in local storage?

globals_schema.formatted_report_T004:
DLF Data Summary Report

This report summarizes the data found in local storage related to DLF. It includes a list of files and their corresponding details, such as file name, type, and size.

File Details

File Name File Type File Size (Bytes)
dlf.md file 4290
DLF_13072023190044_BRSR.pdf file 1024783

Additional Context from Global Schema

The all_globals_schema contains a complete listing of all files. The following files appear to be related to the search term:

  • dlf.md
  • DLF_13072023190044_BRSR.pdf

Observations

Two files directly relating to DLF were identified. The file 'DLF_13072023190044_BRSR.pdf' appears to be a BRSR report (Business Responsibility and Sustainability Report) which likely contains substantial information regarding DLF's operations and sustainability practices. Further analysis of 'dlf.md' is warranted to understand its content and relevance.

nodes.description: List all files and directories within the DATA_DIR to understand available data sources.
nodes.agent_prompt: Write a Python script that lists all files and directories within the DATA_DIR. Print the names, types (file or directory), and sizes (in bytes) of each item. Store the output in `file_list_T001`.

nodes.description: Filter the list to identify items potentially related to 'DLF'.
nodes.agent_prompt: Write a Python script that filters the `file_list_T001` for files and directories whose names contain 'DLF' (case-insensitive). Extract file name, type, and size. Store the filtered list as `dlf_related_files_T002`.

nodes.description: Summarize the findings of the file search related to DLF.
nodes.agent_prompt: Summarize the `dlf_related_files_T002`, including the number of files and directories found, their names, types, and sizes. Create a concise summary of the data related to 'DLF' found in the local storage. Store the summary as `dlf_data_summary_T003`.

nodes.description: Format the findings into a human-readable Markdown report.
nodes.agent_prompt: Format the `dlf_data_summary_T003` into a Markdown report. The report should include a header indicating the search for data related to 'DLF', followed by a list of the found files and directories, including their names, types, and sizes. Make it easily readable. Store formatted result as `formatted_report_T004`
